    • getCondition

      public java.lang.String getCondition​(boolean first)
      Method which returns first half or second half of the Threshold Insert True to return the first condition, False for the second
      Parameters:
      first - if true -> first condition, else second condition
      Returns:
      Desired condition

    • editNumber

      public void editNumber​(int n, int index)

      Parameters:
      n - Number that will replace
      index - Index of the number that is going to be replaced

    • editNumbers
